resources.string: Required to turn screen off and put the device to sleep
Start the service when device boots up
Service is running. Click to pause.
Please enable administrator privileges for Easy Lock.

If you set this option, Easy Lock will try to detect when you're pressing navigation bar soft keys and avoid locking the screen in such scenarios.

However, it's not guaranteed to work always.

This might impact the general performance of the device.

Do you want to enable this option?

If you disable EasyLock notification, Android system may end EasyLock in the background.

It is highly recommended that you keep notification enabled.

Are you sure you want to disable the notification?

In order for Easy Lock to identify softkey presses, it should be granted Usage Access Permission. Click OK to go to Security settings, select \'Apps with usage access\' and enable Easy Lock there. After that please press back to return to Easy Lock.
Please enable usage access to enable this option.
